name: The Golden Ball
description:
The Golden Ball is a casual 3D runner.

Press A and D to rotate, SPACE to jump.

The game is a bit heavy (70mb) so please give it some time to load, thanks.

This is the first game I have ever released so I hope that you enjoy it! Would love to hear your feedback!

To make up for the lack of infinite mode I have added some free hats.
